name: Churky (AnimatiX)
description:
The history of the video game is inspired by the Bolivian story "musician armadillo"

It has been a long time since a wizard from the highlands transformed an armadillo into a charango, he has abandoned somewhere in the highlands, until the moment he was found by the "Mallku" (Andean God) and came back to life, from from that moment "Churky" (the armadillo) will embark on his path to complete the dream of becoming a musician.

The main character "Churky" which in the Bolivian language Aymara means: "tireless, who does not give up, persistent." He has the skills to run, jump, climb, slide, dig and use other special abilities.

On his way he will have several enemies such as foxes, toads, beetles and others who try to prevent Churky from fulfilling his dream of being a musician.

The game is for all people who like to have a fun and entertaining time, it is suitable for all audiences.

The Bolivian story is in this link:

Developed by: Osmar Veneros (Art and Design) and Edson Veneros (Programming)
